org.ejml.alg.block.decomposition
Interface BlockDecompositionInterface

All Known Subinterfaces:
BlockCholeskyDecomposition, BlockQRDecomposition
All Known Implementing Classes:
BlockCholeskyOuterForm, BlockMatrix64HouseholderQR
public interface BlockDecompositionInterface

An interface for performing matrix decompositions on a BlockMatrix64F.

For more information on decompositions see DecompositionInterface.

Author:
Peter Abeles

Method Summary
 boolean decompose(BlockMatrix64F orig)
          Computes the decomposition of the input matrix.
 boolean inputModified()
          Is the input matrix modified.
 

Method Detail

decompose

boolean decompose(BlockMatrix64F orig)
Computes the decomposition of the input matrix. Depending on the implementation the input matrix might be stored internally or modified. If it is modified then the function inputModified() will return true.

Parameters:
orig - The matrix which is being decomposed. Modification is implementation dependent.
Returns:
Returns if it was able to decompose the matrix.

inputModified

boolean inputModified()
Is the input matrix modified.

Returns:
true if the input matrix is modified.
